chunk_text:
[FAQ](https://www.westhillsvineyards.com/tours-faq)
TOURS
#### WHY CHOOSE US? * Curated Winery Selection: Each tour includes visits to three premier local wineries, chosen based on your unique preferences to ensure an exceptional and personalized experience. * Culinary Experience: One of the highlights of our tours is the exceptional culinary experience crafted by our talented onsite chef. Enhance your tour with gourmet bites and sweets for $25 per person.
